edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class TextOpenQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Question
        • edu.ucla.wise.commons.OpenQuestion
          • edu.ucla.wise.commons.TextOpenQuestion

  • public class TextOpenQuestion
extends OpenQuestion
    This class is a subclass of Open_Question and represents an text open ended question on the page.

                             java.lang.String whereclause,
